message.name: ERR_CASEEVID_MRE_NO_UPDATE
message.locale: No updates can be made to this evidence record due to a technical fault. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCE_XRV_ACTIVE_EVIDENCEFORDATE
message.locale: Superseded evidence cannot be modified to be active on a date where there is already active evidence.

message.name: INF_EVIDENCE_EFFECTIVE_UNTIL_DATE
message.locale: This evidence will remain effective until %1s when later evidence will become effective.

message.name: INF_CASEEVIDENCESTATUS_UNAPPROVED_OWNER_SUBJECT
message.locale: Updated evidence on case %1s of type %2s for %3s is pending approval.

message.name: INF_CASEEVIDENCESTATUS_UNAPPROVED_SUPERVISOR_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has new evidence which requires approval.

message.name: INF_CASEEVIDENCESTATUS_UNAPPROVED_SUPERVISOR_REASON
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has new evidence which requires approval.

message.name: INF_CASEEVIDENCESTATUS_UNAPPROVED_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: The updated evidence on case %1s of type %2s for %3s is pending approval.
